q: Bernie Sanders was not the only one looking to raise money in the wake of the shootings. On Monday, the Tea Party Express sent an e-mail to its members asking for contributions. One thing that surprised us was how many in the news media and liberal political figures and organizations immediately launched into an attack on the tea party movement- assigning blame for the shooting to our grass roots, Constitutionalist movement in general, and title="Sarah Palin" rel="homepage" href="http://www.facebook.com/Sarah PalinSarah Palin"> Gov. Sarah Palin in particular, the group said.`` Friends, this is outrageous.'' I don't think he was pushed aside, but he may have been nudged, he said, adding that between the two founders, Mr. Larry Page always appeared more interested in eventually becoming chief executive.`` Clearly Sergey Brin has been paying less attention to management than Larry Page ,'' he said.
